ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image

Class PadMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.PadMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class PadMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a typesafe enumeration of the standard Composite rules for the CompositeRable operation. (over, in, out, atop, xor, arith)
    Version:
    $Id: PadMode.java 475477 2006-11-15 22:44:28Z cam $
    Author:
    Thomas DeWeese
    See Also:
